verses.verse: He said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Come up <S%H5927><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you, <S%H175><s%> and Aaron, Nadab, <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> from a distance. <S%H7350><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> alone shall come near <S%H5066><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> but they shall not come near, <S%H5066><s%> neither shall the people <S%H5971><s%> go up with him. <S%H5927><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and all the ordinances; <S%H4941><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "All the words <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H559><s%> will we do. <S%H6213><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> under the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and twelve pillars <S%H4676><s%> for the twelve <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He sent <S%H7971><s%> young men <S%H5288><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> of cattle <S%H6499><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it in basins, <S%H101><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

He took <S%H3947><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and read <S%H7121><s%> it in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> "All that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> will we do, <S%H6213><s%> and be obedient. <S%H8085><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it on the people, <S%H5971><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Look, <S%H1818><s%> this is the blood of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H3772><s%> with you concerning all these words. <S%H1697><s%>"
Then Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Nadab, <S%H5070><s%> Abihu, <S%H30><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went up. <S%H5927><s%>

They saw <S%H7200><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Under his feet <S%H7272><s%> was like a paved <S%H3840><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of sapphire stone, <S%H5601><s%> like the <S%H6106><s%> skies <S%H8064><s%> for clearness. <S%H2892><s%>

He didn't <S%H7971><s%> lay his hand <S%H3027><s%> on the nobles <S%H678><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> They saw <S%H2372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and ate <S%H398><s%> and drank. <S%H8354><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Come up <S%H5927><s%> to me on the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and stay here, <S%H5414><s%> and I will give you the tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> with the law <S%H8451><s%> and the commands <S%H4687><s%> that I have written, <S%H3789><s%> that you may teach them. <S%H3384><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> with Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> his servant, <S%H8334><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> onto God <S%H430><s%>'s Mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to the elders, <S%H2205><s%> "Wait <S%H3427><s%> here <S%H2088><s%> for us, <S%H7725><s%> until we come again to you. <S%H175><s%> Behold, Aaron and Hur <S%H2354><s%> are with you. <S%H4310><s%> Whoever is <S%H1167><s%> involved in a dispute <S%H1697><s%> can <S%H1167><s%> go to them. <S%H5066><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> on the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

The glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> settled <S%H7931><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it six <S%H8337><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%> The seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the cloud. <S%H6051><s%>

The appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was like devouring <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> on the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights. <S%H3915><s%>
